title: Total Row
reference-overview: The Total Row is a Data Table Add-On. It functions the same way the Subtotal Row Add-On does, itâ€™s just a different color.
reference-usage: Use this add-on when the table needs to contain a Total of the amounts per column
reference-details:
Color

The Total Row should default to a darker background color than the Subtotal Row: #e6e6e6.

Width

You can set column width using a helper Class. Since the Static Data Table functions within the Mercer Grid System, it will automatically adapt and configure itself.

Row Details

  • Padding for all Static Data Table rows is set to five pixels on the top and bottom and ten pixels to the left and right.
  • Line height of Basic Data Table Total Rows is 13 pixels to keep text consistent with Mercer branding.
  • Total Row text is right aligned.
  • Total Row text is always in bold.
